summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of 55th Avenue Northeast from 55th Place Northeast to approximately 190 feet north thereof, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6125, authorizing an increase in the amount to be paid from the Water Fund in aid thereof as a loan, and amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 85072.
